author: shannnon davis
comment: Gps is fairly good. Functionality is a little tricky at times. It's fine if you are recording your exercise as you go but its a bit confusing if you want to add past exercise logs. My biggest irritation is that I wish it gave the option to change the start of the week to Monday instead of Sunday. I'd also like to see the ability to change the 'other 1,2,3,etc' options to specify what you are doing instead of writing in the description

author: Swaazi
comment: Great app, use it for everything from measuring out training routines to tracking all forms of exercise. Never had a glitch or issue. Highly recommended.

author: Dr.Divyang Dave
comment: One of best and accurate app for running.Excellnt analysis of workout available, helpful for motivation.

author: Newton Nderitu
comment: This app closes when the screen on my oppo f3 locks and all it tracks is only 5 to 6 min of my run. Please fix without asking me not to lock my screen.

reply.author: Amer Sports Digital
reply.content:
Hi,

Thanks for your feedback!

Sports Tracker is optimised for "pure" Android. 
If you are using customised Android based operating systems there may occur compatibility issues with Sports Tracker app. e.g. Oppo phones are using Customised Android called  Color OS.

Kind Regards,

Your Sports Tracker Team

author: Narayan Bhosale
comment: Its good running and walking tracking app!

author: sunil sharma
comment: it is not recording pace during phone is locked

reply.author: Amer Sports Digital
reply.content:
Hi

Thanks for your feedback.

You could try turn off app optimising from the phone battery settings, from Sports Tracker. 
Here are also some tips how to improve accuracy: http://bit.ly/ST-android-gps
If those won´t help could you contact our support from app settings or here: http://bit.ly/ST-contact-form

Kind regards,

Your Sports Tracker team

author: A Google User
comment: I have a genuine Sports Tracker HRM belt but the actual belt part broke. While waiting for a replacement my backup is a Medisana 99639. But ST refuses to find it. E.g. Activio finds it without problems.

reply.author: Amer Sports Digital
reply.content:
Hi,

Thanks for your feedback! 
You can find more information and tips from our support site:
https://sports-tracker.helpshift.com/a/sports-tracker/?p=all&l=en&s=accessories&f=is-my-bluetooth-smart-heart-rate-monitor-compatible-android

Kind Regards, 

Your Sports Tracker Team

author: Jiří Pech
comment: I love the voice feedback when running against my own ghost targets (previous runs) and it says "You're 25 seconds ahead". It also motivates me when I hear "You are 5 seconds behind". This app helps me keeping my results steady and improve my time and distance over time. Started with 3 km @ 7 km/h and after two years my usual distance is 13 km @ 13+ km/h.
